property.caption: Error Message
property.description: Message to display if the Walkthrough Initialization fails.

property.caption: Intro steps
property.description: Each item in this list will render as a 'step' in the walkthrough.

property.caption: Selector
property.description: Selector for the element. (If empty, the walkthrough step will appear in the middle of the screen)

property.caption: Selector is Name
property.description: Choose 'Yes' is you're using the Mendix component name as the selector

property.caption: Text
property.description: The text that will show up in the walkthrough step. HTML tags are welcome.

property.caption: Position
property.description: The position (relative to `Element`) for the walkthrough step to appear. Acceptable values are: top | right | bottom | left. Defaults to "bottom"
